snippet: E. Gordon Gee is known for his outspokenness, which has landed him in trouble at times. But controversy over a remark about Notre Dame has not abated.
abstract: E Gordon Gee announces his retirement as president of Ohio State University; Gee, who is known for his quirky, outspoken nature, has recently been embroiled in series of embarrassing gaffes in his role at university.
lead_paragraph: E. Gordon Gee is known for his outspokenness, which has landed him in trouble at times. But controversy over a remark about Notre Dame has not abated.

headline.seo: E. Gordon Gee to Retire From Ohio State Presidency
headline.main: Quirky Leader of Ohio State Is Set to Retire After Remarks
headline.print_headline: Quirky Leader Of Ohio State Is Set to Retire After Remarks
